channel.name: MTV UK
channel.title: Catfish
channel.desc: After a year and a half of chatting with her online, Tyler thinks he may have a future with Amanda. But are Tyler's friends correct because they suspect that something isn't right? (S1, ep8).

channel.name: MTV UK
channel.title: Catfish
channel.desc: Mike and Felicia met online and soon hit it off. After agreeing to meet, Felicia stood Mike up, offering only thin excuses. Can Mike trust Felicia - or will he end up disappointed? (S1, ep12).

channel.name: MTV UK
channel.title: Ink Master Redemption
channel.desc: In a Redemption first, Runner-Up Master Canvases defend their tattoos against the Artists who defeated them. Cleen Rock One, Anthony Michaels, Jime Litwalk and Joey Hamilton return. (S3, ep2).

channel.name: MTV UK
channel.title: Ink Master Redemption
channel.desc: Season 5 Artist Julia Carlson is back for another shot at Redemption with not one, not two, but three unhappy Canvases. (S3, ep3).
